title: Panel Functionality
author: TDGalea
body_snippet:
Using the quickconnent bar, connections open in a panel called "General". If I'm in that panel and haven't renamed it, great. But if I want multiple, connections being opened in a new panel called "General" isn't what I want.

## Expected Behavior
Connections opened via the quickconnect field should open in the currently active panel.

## Current Behavior
Connections opened via the quickconnect field forcefully create a new panel called "General" and open inside that.
They cannot be moved...

comments.author: Kvarkas
comments.snippet: Make sense, however currently we have a setting for each connection in what panel its assigned, so if quick connect find a match it will run in in regards to that setting. Could you check if you set different panel e.g. not a general behaviour still same?
